title: Next.js Fundamentals
description: Master the fundamentals of Next.js and build modern React applications with server-side rendering, routing, and API routes.

lessons.title: Introduction to Next.js
lessons.transcript: Welcome to Next.js Fundamentals. In this course, you'll learn how to build modern web applications using Next.js...

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
lessons.content: Before we dive into Next.js, let's set up your development environment. First, make sure you have Node.js installed. You can check by running `node --version` in your terminal. Next, install Next.js globally using npm...

questions.question: What is Next.js primarily used for?
options: Building React-based web applications with SSR

questions.question: Which command is used to create a new Next.js project?

lessons.title: Understanding File-Based Routing
lessons.transcript: Next.js uses a file-based routing system. This means that the structure of your files determines the routes in your application...

lessons.title: Dynamic Routes Explained
lessons.content: Dynamic routes allow you to create pages with variable segments. For example, if you create a file named `[id].js` in your pages directory, it will match any route like `/posts/123` or `/posts/456`...

questions.question: How do you create a dynamic route in Next.js?

lessons.title: getServerSideProps Deep Dive
lessons.transcript: Server-side rendering is one of Next.js's key features. The getServerSideProps function allows you to fetch data on the server before rendering...

lessons.title: Static Site Generation with getStaticProps
lessons.content: Static Site Generation (SSG) is a powerful feature that allows you to pre-render pages at build time. This results in faster page loads and better SEO...

title: Machine Learning 101
description: An introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and practical applications.

lessons.title: What is Machine Learning?
lessons.transcript: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables systems to learn from data...

lessons.title: Types of Machine Learning
lessons.content: There are three main types of machine learning: supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning...

questions.question: Which type of machine learning uses labeled data?
What is the process of training a model called?
